      • getPartitionId

        public int getPartitionId()
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Returns the partition ID.

        The partition ID will be between 0 and partitionCount (exclusive).

        Specified by:

      • isMigrating

        public boolean isMigrating()
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Checks if there currently is a migration going on in this partition.

        The returned value could be stale when it is returned.

        Specified by:
        isMigrating in interface IPartition
        Returns:

      • isLocal

        public boolean isLocal()
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Checks if the partition is local. A partition is local if and only if the IPartition.getOwnerOrNull() returns the same address as 'this' address of the ClusterService.getThisAddress(). If the address is null or a different address, false is returned.
        Specified by:
        isLocal in interface IPartition
        Returns:
        true if local, false otherwise

      • getOwnerOrNull

        public Address getOwnerOrNull()
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Returns the address of the owner of this partition.

        If no owner has been set yet, null is returned. So be careful with assuming that a non null value is returned.

        The value could be stale when returned.

        Specified by:
        getOwnerOrNull in interface IPartition
        Returns:
        the owner

      • getReplicaAddress

        public Address getReplicaAddress(int replicaIndex)
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Returns the address of the replica.

        The owner has replica index 0.

        The returned value could be null if the owner/replica has not yet been set.

        The returned value could be stale when it is returned.

        Specified by:
        getReplicaAddress in interface IPartition
        Parameters:
        replicaIndex - the index of the replica
        Returns:
        the address of the replica

      • isOwnerOrBackup

        public boolean isOwnerOrBackup(Address address)
        Description copied from interface: IPartition
        Checks if given address is owner of primary or backup of this partition.
        Specified by:
        isOwnerOrBackup in interface IPartition
        Parameters:
        address - owner address
        Returns:
        true if address is owner or backup, false otherwise

        Return the replica index for this partition.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
